Title: Bug Fix: Login Issue
Body: Fixed authentication problem that was preventing users from logging in during peak hours.

Title: New Feature: Dark Mode
Body: Added dark mode theme option for better user experience in low-light environments.

Title: Enhancement: Performance
Body: Improved page load times by 40% through optimization of database queries.

Title: Bug Fix: Data Export
Body: Resolved issue where exported CSV files were missing column headers.

Title: New Feature: Analytics Dashboard
Body: Implemented comprehensive analytics dashboard with real-time metrics.
